title: Cinema Club Membership
description: Join the Fort Kent Cinema family and enjoy exclusive benefits all year long. Our Cinema Club members are the heart of our community, and we love to show our appreciation with special perks and savings.
perks: Discounted tickets for all regular showings
Free popcorn on your birthday month
Early access to special screenings and events

plans.name: Annual Pass
plans.description: Unlimited savings for the whole family
